work.summary: Lead developer for the 2022 Cigna.com Redesign working on web components and apps used in site-wide initiatives, including Medicare, Open Enrollment, and Plan Finder. Development efforts resulted in a 38% increase of traffic to the shopping experience and a 67% reduction of accessibility issues.

details.text: Rebuilt the frontend and backend of Cigna's Supplemental Claim Form using Lit, TypeScript, AWS Lambda, AWS SES, AWS S3, and Jest.
Rebuilt the frontend of Cigna's Individuals and Families State Plan Finder and Search applications using Lit and TypeScript.
Increased component reusability by 47% by developing utilities leveraging existing frameworks and web standards to overcome encapsulation limitations.
Mentored junior developers in our tech stack and supported them through the debugging process.
Automated data entry process by developing a claim form using JavaScript and Sass.
Developed an AWS Lambda API to support search indexing for two sites using JavaScript.
Refactored department’s file search utility from Perl to Node.js to improve code maintainability.
Oversaw strategic direction, managed budgets, and conducted interviews for networking positions across six offices for the Technology Early Career Program (TECDP).
Managed department’s website migration. Developed filtering tools, designed pages, and collaborated with teams on content management strategies.
Liaison for Incident Response teams. Triaged software upgrade issues to prevent disruptions to critical resolution processes.
Resolved over 2,000 emails in 7 months for conferencing software. Hosted 80 support meetings and 15 training sessions for hundreds of employees.
Organized 30 events for TECDP colleagues to meet with peers, mentors, and leadership.

work.summary: Analyzed power requirements and supervised data center hardware deployments for contractors.

details.text: Won 1st place with team on the TECDP Group Project. Presented concepts for a mental health app.
JavasScript (ES6+)
TypeScript
